ai_business_context: Sudzy Laundromat is a self-service laundromat with washers, dryers, folding tables, seating, restrooms, vending/soap dispensers, and change/payment machines. Customers commonly report broken or malfunctioning equipment, leaks/water issues, cleanliness problems, and occasional safety/access concerns.
ai_categorization_instructions: Prefer specific categories (e.g., washer_out_of_order vs. general equipment). When unsure, use `other` and add a short note to internal context in the issue description.

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: washer, washing machine, spin, cycle, door, won’t start, error code, out of order
issue_categories.description: Washers not working correctly (won’t start, error codes, door issues, poor spin, etc.).
issue_categories.label: Washer out of order

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: dryer, drying, heat, no heat, won’t start, timer, lint, squeal
issue_categories.description: Dryers not working correctly (no heat, won’t start, loud noise, timer issues).
issue_categories.label: Dryer out of order

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: change machine, coin machine, bill, dollar, quarters, stuck, ate my money, refund
issue_categories.description: Change machine problems (won’t accept bills, stuck, incorrect payout).
issue_categories.label: Change machine issue

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: card reader, tap, chip, payment, app, kiosk, credit, debit
issue_categories.description: Payment system issues (card readers, kiosks, app-based payment).
issue_categories.label: Payment system issue

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: leak, water, puddle, flooding, drip, hose, drain, overflow
issue_categories.description: Leaks, puddles, drainage problems, or water damage concerns.
issue_categories.label: Leak / water issue

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: dirty, mess, spill, trash, sticky, floor, wipe, mop, smell
issue_categories.description: General cleanliness issues in customer areas (floors, tables, seating).
issue_categories.label: General cleanliness

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: restroom, bathroom, toilet, sink, soap, paper towels, hand dryer
issue_categories.label: Restroom issue

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: soap dispenser, vending, detergent, softener, machine ate money, out of stock
issue_categories.description: Vending/soap dispenser issues (out of stock, jammed, ate money).
issue_categories.label: Vending / soap dispenser

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: door, lock, lighting, light, AC, heat, temperature, fan, outlet, plug
issue_categories.description: Facility maintenance issues (doors, lighting, HVAC, outlets).
issue_categories.label: Facility maintenance

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: unsafe, slippery, hazard, broken glass, exposed wire, smell gas
issue_categories.label: Safety hazard

issue_categories.description: Use when no other category fits. Add a short internal note in the issue description.
issue_categories.label: Other

comments.body: Thanks for looking into it—please post a note on the machine when it’s back up so we know it’s safe to use.

issues.description: Washer #12 (front-load) starts filling then stops and flashes an error. Door stays locked for several minutes after it stops.

reports.body: Machine 12 took my payment, started, then stopped mid-fill with an error. Had to wait for the door to unlock.
Same washer #12 is still acting up—stops after a minute and won’t run the cycle.

updates.message: Technician scheduled; machine tagged OUT OF ORDER to prevent use.
Diagnosed intermittent door lock sensor; parts ordered.

issues.description: Dryer #7 runs but produces little/no heat. Clothes still damp after two cycles.

reports.body: Dryer 7 spins but there’s basically no heat. Wasted $3 trying to dry towels.
Dryer 7 spins but there’s basically no heat. Wasted $3 trying to dry towels. Also noticed by another guest (separately reported).

updates.message: Logged for service; checking heating element/thermostat and lint airflow.

comments.body: It finally worked after I tried a different bill, but it still shouldn’t reject clean $10s.

issues.description: Change machine near entrance rejecting multiple bills and occasionally not dispensing quarters after accepting.

reports.body: Change machine by the front door kept spitting back my $10 (not ripped). After it accepted once, it didn’t give quarters.
Same issue—accepted a $5 and only gave some of the quarters. Please check it.

updates.message: Cleared bill validator path and refilled hopper; monitoring for short-dispense.
Replaced worn belts in validator; test transactions successful.

issues.description: Puddle forming under/near the large-capacity washers on Row B. Floor is slick and looks like it’s spreading toward the aisle.

reports.body: There’s a big puddle by the big washers (Row B). Almost slipped walking past with my basket.

updates.message: Wet floor sign placed; staff mopped and is checking for active leak source.
Suspected drain/standpipe backup during high-volume cycles; plumber requested.

comments.body: Appreciate it—tables looked much better later that day.

issues.description: Folding tables have detergent residue and lint buildup; surfaces feel sticky.

reports.body: The folding tables are sticky and covered in lint. Hard to fold clean clothes on them.
The folding tables are sticky and covered in lint. Hard to fold clean clothes on them. Also noticed by another guest (separately reported).

updates.message: Deep-cleaned folding tables and wiped down surrounding ledges; added mid-day wipe schedule.

issues.description: Restroom sink faucet handle is loose and hard to turn off fully; water drips continuously.

reports.body: Bathroom sink handle is loose and the faucet keeps dripping even when you try to shut it off.
Bathroom sink handle is loose and the faucet keeps dripping even when you try to shut it off. Also noticed by another guest (separately reported).

updates.message: Maintenance notified; planning to tighten handle and replace cartridge if needed.

issues.description: Trash can near the dryers is overflowing with lint sheets and cups; debris on floor nearby.

reports.body: Trash by the dryers is completely full and stuff is falling onto the floor.
Trash by the dryers is completely full and stuff is falling onto the floor. Also noticed by another guest (separately reported).

updates.message: Trash emptied and area swept; added extra liner and moved a second bin closer to lint disposal.

issues.description: Soap vending machine is out of stock for detergent pods; selection button lights but nothing dispenses.

reports.body: Tried to buy detergent pods from the vending machine—button lights up but it says sold out / nothing comes out.

updates.message: Restocked detergent pods and tested vend; updated inventory labels.

issues.description: Several ceiling lights flickering over the center aisle; area feels dim at night.

reports.body: Lights are flickering in the middle of the laundromat. Makes it hard to see if machines are clean.

updates.message: Identified 3 failing tubes/ballasts; replacement parts ordered.

comments.body: Thank you for putting the sign out quickly—someone could’ve really gotten hurt.

issues.description: Slip hazard from water near Row B aisle. (Related to puddle report; treat as safety priority.)

reports.body: The floor is super slippery near the big washers—please put a caution sign or mop ASAP.
The floor is super slippery near the big washers—please put a caution sign or mop ASAP. Also noticed by another guest (separately reported).

updates.message: Caution signage placed and area cordoned with cones while investigating leak source.

issues.description: Card reader on Dryer #14 intermittently declines cards; works after multiple retries.

reports.body: Tried to pay with tap on dryer 14 and it kept declining. Worked on the 4th try.
Dryer 14 card reader is still flaky—chip reads then errors out.

updates.message: Rebooted reader and reseated network cable; updated firmware; test payments successful.

issues.description: Parking lot light near the entrance is out; front area is dark after sunset.

reports.body: The light in the parking lot by the front door is out. It’s really dark at night.

updates.message: Reported to electrician/landlord for fixture check; awaiting service date.

issues.description: Other (note: unclear if policy or equipment): Customer requested clearer signage about last wash/last dry times; several people unsure when attendants stop assisting.

reports.body: Can you add a sign for last wash/last dry? I wasn’t sure if I could start a load at 8:45.
Can you add a sign for last wash/last dry? I wasn’t sure if I could start a load at 8:45. Also noticed by another guest (separately reported).
